content: साधन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [साध् णिच् ल्यु ल्युद् वा] Accomplishing, effecting &c. --नं {@--1@} Accomplishing, effecting, performing; as in स्वार्थसाधनं. {@--2@} Fulfilment, accomplishment, complete attainment of an object; प्रजार्थसाधने तौ हि पर्यायोद्यतकार्मुकौ <ls>R. 4. 16.</ls> {@--3@} A means, an expedient, a means of accomplishing anything; शरीरमाद्यं खलु धर्मसाधनं <ls>Ku. 5. 33</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">52</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 19.</ls> <ls n="R.">4. 36</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">62.</ls> {@--4@} An instrument, agent; कुठारः छिदिक्रियासाधनम्. {@--5@} The efficient cause, source, cause in general. {@--6@} The instrumental case. {@--7@} Implement, apparatus. {@--8@} Appliance, materials. {@--9@} Matter, ingredients, substance. {@--10@} An army or a part thereof; <ls>Mu. 5. 10.</ls> {@--11@} Aid, help, assistance (in general). {@--12@} Proof, substantiation, demonstration. {@--13@} The {%hetu%} or middle term in a syllogism, reason, that which leads to a conclusion; साध्ये निश्चितमन्वयेन घटितं बिभ्रत्सपक्षे स्थितिं व्यावृत्तं च विपक्षतो भवति यत्तत्साधनं सिद्धये <ls>Mu. 5. 10.</ls> {@--14@} Subduing, overcoming. {@--15@} Subduing by charms. {@--16@} Accomplishing anything by charms or magic. {@--17@} Healing, curing. {@--18@} Killing, destroying; फलं च तस्य प्रतिसाधनं <ls>Ki. 14. 17.</ls> {@--19@} Conciliating, propitiating, winning over. {@--20@} Going out, setting forward, departure. {@--21@} Going after, following. {@--22@} Penance, self-mortification. {@--23@} Attainment of final beatitude. {@--24@} A medicinal preparation, drug, medicine. {@--25@} (In law) Enforcement of the delivery of anything, or of the payment of debt, infliction of fine. {@--26@} A bodily organ. {@--27@} The penis. {@--28@} An udder. {@--29@} Wealth. {@--30@} Friendship. {@--31@} Profit, advantage. {@--32@} Burning a dead body. {@--33@} Obsequies. {@--34@} Killing or oxydation of metals.
